message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I think my product is worth more than $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and that's the lowest I can go.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $84.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target. I can do $82. Would that be acceptable to you?
I'm willing to make another small concession, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $83.50.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd like to try one more time to get a better deal. I can do $82.25. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to my own limit, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between our last offers. I'll sell the product to you for $82.75.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target. I can do $82. I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Can you accept this price?
